name: OSK (itch)
description:
OSK is my first release as a solo-developer.

This is a retro 2D platformer with pixel-art graphics.

The adventure takes place in a futuristic Osaka.

Tip, the kitsune (a fox spirit in the Jananese culture) is suffering a breathing illness because of the atmospheric pollution.  In a last attempt to save is life, he needs to possess a young girl called Kumiko, the only person who knows the forest enough to find a magical plant, the Althaea Officinalis. In exchange, he promesses her the eternal protection of her soul...

I wish you the best in your journey along with Tip &Kumiko.

Cheers!

PS: As OSK is the first level of my prototype,  there's still two little bugs. I'll fix them as soon as possible. If you would like to help me improving it, rate the game and/or leave me a comment.

SETTINGS:

=> Arrows or QD = MOVE

=> Space Bar or Down arrow = JUMP

=> Left Mouse Click = SHOOT
